list: Only voters who are voting for the first time in their election district need to show ID. The ID does not need to include a photograph but must include name and address.
Driverâ€™s license or PennDOT ID card
Current utility bill, bank statement, paycheck or government check
Any ID issued by the commonwealth or federal government
Confirmation issued by the County Voter Registration Office
notes: If you have voted at your polling location before, you do not need to bring an ID to vote.
